column3: Is it ok that this PR is not based on the master branch? I mean, a commit parent is not a merge commit.
> Is it ok that this PR is not based on the master branch?\n\nHuh, I think it is impossible to create a pull request for a branch that isn't based on a commit in the target branch?
> I mean, a commit parent is not a merge commit.\n\nI don't think we do or should require that. Would there be a reason?
